document_data.name: Poison Spray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Poison spray''''' was a [[conjuration]] [[spell]] that created a cloud of poisonous gas.
document_data.Effects: When cast, a small cloud of poisonous gas was created from the caster's palm. This cloud enveloped a target creature. The spell was only effective as a short-range attack, as the target creature was required to be within 10 feet (3 meters) of the caster.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
